home.source: SBI EBLR home loan: repo + 2.65% base, +0.10-0.85% credit risk premium (sbi.co.in). Typical effective spread ~2.75% for 750+ CIBIL score.

personal.source: SBI personal loan: 10.05%-15.05% (repo 5.25% + 4.80-9.80% spread). Major banks range up to 17%. paisabazaar.com/personal-loan/sbi-personal-loan-interest-rates
